title: Sum to Product Identity
text: The formula to express the sum of two cosines as a product is as follows: $$cos\left(a\right)+cos\left(b\right)=2cos\left(\frac{a+b}{2}\right) cos\left(\frac{a-b}{2}\right)$$.

title: Cosine Properties
text: Since the cosine is an even function, $$cos(-x)=cos(x)$$. Use this property to rewrite all angles as positive.
